title: Office of the Governor of New York and TDI-USA Holdings LLC (TDI)

communications.subject: New York Freedom of Information Law Request: Office of the Governor of New York and TDI-USA Holdings LLC (TDI)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

Correspondence between the Office of the Governor of New York and TDI-USA Holdings LLC., including emails and meeting notes, pertaining to the Champlain Hudson Power Express, and subsidies. Specific people in the office whose correspondence I am looking for include Governor Kathy Hochul, as well as the governor's staff members including Secretary, Karen Persichilli Keogh; Director of state operations and infrastructure, Kathryn Garcia and TDI-USA Holdings LLC.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Julieta Cardenas
